body.name: DISNEY PRINCESS Shimmer Spa Ariel 8-inch Styling Head, 20-Pieces, Red Hair, Pretend Play, Officially Licensed Kids Toys for Ages 3 Up by Just Play
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Includes: 8-inch styling head, detachable play sink, color-change water tool, color-change nail tool, brush, hair extension, 4 barrettes, bottle, 3 hair spirals, and 6 elastic hair bands.

20-Piece Styling Head Set: The Disney Princess Shimmer Spa Ariel Styling Head lets preschoolers dress up and pretend play at being stylists. Brush and style Ariel’s hair into beautiful new looks and give her a manicure!

Wash Ariel's Hair: This deluxe role-play set comes with an 8-inch Princess Ariel styling head with hands, and a play sink that really holds water. The styling head has a poseable neck, so kids can tilt Ariel's head back into the sink, just like in a real salon! Pour water over Ariel's long hair and pretend to shampoo with the included bottle. When finished, Ariel's hair will air-dry in minutes, ready for kids to style.

Inspires Imaginative Play: Aspiring stylists will love creating stunning up-dos, fancy braids, ponytails, wavy curls, and more. Hair play helps develop independence and self-confidence, and improves motor skills.

Reveal Color-Change Nails and Hair: Use the color-change applicators to change the hair extension from light to dark purple, and Ariel's nails from pink to purple. Ice-cold water activates the color change – warm water restores the original shade.
More Princesses for More Fun: Collect all the Disney Princess Styling Heads and have friends over for a salon-themed party!
Gift Idea For Kids: This Disney Princess preschool toy makes an enchanting gift for girls and boys ages 3 years and up.
body.description: Let creativity shine with the Disney Princess Shimmer Spa Ariel Styling Head. This beautiful Disney Princess 8-inch styling head has an articulated neck and hands, and comes with a detachable play sink that really holds water! Tilt Princess Ariel's head back, fill the pretend shampoo bottle with water, and wash her hair in the basin, just like in a real salon. Made of a quick-drying synthetic fiber, Ariel's long, red hair will air-dry in minutes, ready for styling. Attach the clip-on hair extension to make a bold statement. Use the color-change water tool to change the hair extension from light to dark purple! Accessorize with 3 hair spirals, 4 barrettes, or 6 hair elastics. For the finishing touch, give Ariel a manicure with the color-change nail tool. Pivot Ariel's hands forward, apply cold water with the applicator, and watch her nails change from pink to purple. Perfect for pretend play, kids can imagine they’re styling Princess Ariel to attend a fancy ball! Ariel’s hair can be twisted into a regal up-do, tied into a high ponytail, worn down in wavy curls, and more. Whichever looks aspiring stylists dream up for mermaid Ariel, hair play helps develop independence and self-confidence, and improves motor skills. This Disney Princess preschool toy makes an enchanting gift for fans of Disney's The Little Mermaid and creative kids ages 3 years and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a 5 year old--she was so EXCITED to get it---right up her ally. The box is the only thing that is not disappointing. You will need ICE not cold water. The "magic water bottle" is so tiny to fill it is not worth it at all. Her hair does NOT change color...don't care what the box says it doesn't . The "wand" is super hard to use for a 5 year old, plus the bottle given to attach it is crap too. Extremely hard to fill with "icy cold water"The nails don't change either--the pad they give to "do" the nails is crappy--breaks within the first 10 minutes. Overall, I wouldn't waste any money purchasing this for your little one. It is very disappointing.
Le gustó bastante a mi hija y le resultó bastante útil
El plástico se ve un poco barato, pero es bonita.

Mi niña estaba muy contenta, desde hace tiempo quería esa muñeca para hacerle sus peinados, pero después de sacar la muñeca del empaque comenzó a cepillarla y las puntas se llenaron de nudos. Al irla peinando y desenredando nudos, el cabello se iba cayendo, buscamos tratamiento para desenredar puntas de cabello para muñecas y funcionó un poco ya que las puntas estaban muy enredadas. La muñeca se ha quedado con poco pelo a una hora de comenzar a jugar después de sacarla de su empaque.
